description: This file defines a DialogFragment subclass named RatingOverlayFragment used for displaying a post-playback content rating overlay in an Android application. It includes UI setup, focus management for TV, event handling, and state observation related to the rating overlay, including buttons for like, love, dislike, and close actions.

classes.name: RatingOverlayFragment
classes.description: A DialogFragment for displaying a post-playback overlay with rating options and countdown, optimized for TV focus navigation, integrating with ViewModel for state management.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of RatingOverlayFragment.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Attaches the fragment to a context and sets the host if it implements RatingOverlayHost.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets the dialog style to a translucent overlay theme.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Configures the dialog window to be fullscreen with transparent background.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI elements, sets focus and event listeners, and observes ViewModel state.

methods.name: setupDpadOrder
methods.description: Configures focus navigation order and wrap-around logic for the rating buttons.
